message: Let's be fair, 60% for me and 40% for you is a good deal!
Let's split the difference for a faster deal. 55% for me and 45% for you.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers, 57.5% for me is a good compromise
Time is running out, let's settle this. I'll come down slightly to 52.5% for me.
I'm willing to compromise, 56.25% for me is as low as I'll go for now
We're getting close!  Let's avoid disaster, 51.25% for me seems fair.
I'm still not convinced, 55.5% for me is my new bottom line
Alice, we're running out of time.  This is my final offer - 50.5% for me. Take it or leave it.
